title: x_ased_sms
description: The SMS Object represents an instance of an sms message.

type.description: The value of this property MUST be `x_ased_linkedin`.

x_ased_delivered_to.description: Specifies the E.164 formatted phone number the message was delivered to. The value should This must be the value from incoming_message_json["meta"]["provenance"]["account"].

x_ased_from.description: Specifies the E.164 formatted phone number that the message was sent from

x_ased_message_id.description: UUID found in the meta data of the kafka incoming message json: incoming_message['meta']['uuid']
